mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.permissions_id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.`code`, m.icon, m.sorting, m.description, m.remark, m.type, m.state, m.activity, m.create_time, m.creater_id, m.modify_time, m.modifier_id, sub.id AS sub_id, sub.permissions_id AS sub_permissions_id, sub.parent_id AS sub_parent_id, sub.`name` AS sub_name, sub.`code` AS sub_code, sub.icon AS sub_icon, sub.sorting AS sub_sorting, sub.description AS sub_description, sub.remark AS sub_remark, sub.type AS sub_type, sub.state AS sub_state, sub.activity AS sub_activity, sub.create_time AS sub_create_time, sub.creater_id AS sub_creater_id, sub.modify_time AS sub_modify_time, sub.modifier_id AS modifier_id FROM sys_menu AS m LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sub ON m.id = sub.parent_id WHERE m.parent_id IS NULL
